remarks: Two ways to express that vectors have different spans.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-2015.)
statement:
lspsnne1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnne1.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lspsnne1.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnne1.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lspsnne1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
lspsnne1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lspsnne1.e $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
lspsnne1 $p |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
